sub_title: Theologian, musician with 20 + years experience in music education and church work. Social driver at Trevvel
summary: Claude is a native French speaker from Africa and a multi-disciplined professional trainer, who has been teaching children and adults in various fields: language (French), music, choir conducting, and theology. Claude has settled in Rotterdam and apart from French he speaks Dutch, English and Swedish. He has worked as a Teacher in 4 different international schools in Africa. He is used to working with many different nationalities. He was ordained as a Pastor in African Inland Church in Sudan in 2006 and served there until August 2009 among Sudanese and Congolese. Currently he is part time church worker and choir director at an international church in Rotterdam.
